feed.title: John Braat's Blog
feed.subtitle: My learnings, thoughts on software, programming, tech, and my personal life.

entry.title: Should You Go All In On Indie Hacking?

entry.title: Kill Your Onces

entry.title: Build a React TailwindCSS Chrome Extension in 5 Minutes

entry.title: There Is No Try, Only Do
